settings.question_1: What is this product made of?
settings.answer_1: This product is crafted from premium, high-quality materials designed for durability and comfort. All materials are carefully selected to ensure the best experience for our customers.
settings.question_2: How do I care for this product?
settings.answer_2: For best results, follow the care instructions included with your product. Generally, we recommend gentle cleaning and proper storage to maintain quality and extend the product's lifespan.
settings.answer_3: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, please contact our customer service team to initiate a return.
settings.answer_4: Standard shipping typically takes 5-7 business days. Expedited shipping options are available at checkout for faster delivery. You'll receive a tracking number once your order ships.

settings.question: What is your shipping policy?
settings.answer: We offer free shipping on orders over $50. Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days.

settings.question: How do I return an item?
settings.answer: You can initiate a return within 30 days of purchase. Simply contact our customer service team for a return label.

settings.question: Do you offer international shipping?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship to over 100 countries worldwide. International shipping rates vary by destination.
